      • analyseString

        public static java.util.List<Token> analyseString(java.lang.String text,
                                                  org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer analyzer)
        Analyze the input text with the given Analyzer.
        Parameters:
        text - plain text in UTF-8
        analyzer - Instantiate analyzer with one of ArabicAnalyzer, ArTokenAnalyzer, ArNormalAnalyzer, or ArStemPretokAnalyzer depending on your use case.
        Returns:
        list of Tokens. Depending on the Analyzer the tokens will have different stems (value of Token.getStem()):
        • ArabicAnalyzer and ArStemPretokAnalyzer: the stem will be the stem resulting from the Light10 stemmer implemented by ArabicStemmer.
        • ArNormalAnalyzer: the stem will be the orthographic normalization of the original token text, as produced by ArabicNormalizer.
        • ArTokenAnalyzer: the stem will be the same as the content, i.e. the substring in the input spanned by the token.
